dublinCore.dc:title: 113 HR 5643 IH: To amend the Omnibus Crime Control and Safe Streets Act of 1968 to reauthorize the public safety and community policing grant program, and for other purposes.
dublinCore.dc:rights: Pursuant to Title 17 Section 105 of the United States Code, this file is not subject to copyright protection and is in the public domain.

action.action-desc: Mr. Reed (for himself and Mr. McIntyre) introduced the following bill; which was referred to the Committee on the Judiciary

form.official-title: To amend the Omnibus Crime Control and Safe Streets Act of 1968 to reauthorize the public safety and community policing grant program, and for other purposes.

section.header: Reauthorization of public safety and community policing grants
section.text: Section 1101(a)(11) of the Omnibus Crime Control and Safe Streets Act of 1968 (42 U.S.C. 3793(a)(11)) is amendedâ€”

paragraph.text:
in subparagraph (A), by striking 2006 through 2009 and inserting
2015 through 2019
; and
by amending subparagraph (B) to read as follows:

subparagraph.text: Of funds available under part Q in any fiscal year, not less than $30,000,000 shall be allocated for grants pursuant to applications submitted by units of local government or law enforcement agencies in order to carry out the purpose described in section 1701(b)(12).
